name: CHERNO
description:
Game based on the creepy pasta "The Russian Sleep Experiment", tells the story of an intern who needs to do his internship in a clinic in the Soviet Union, while an explosion occurs that leaves them without electricity. With a flashlight and the help of his supervisor he will try to escape without being devoured by the experiments.



You must look for all the clues that the doctor has left you to go down each floor and thus be able to get out. But it won't be easy since you shouldn't let yourself be touched by the experiments that are found in each room of the building.



The game has 5 levels where you will enter the mysterious building where the Russian experiments are located, use your detective skills to escape from each level and thus leave the clinic alive. In each level you will find clues that will be part of the key to get out. Show your ingenuity to be able to escape without being touched by the experiments.
